name: Ragnarok Heavy Assault Cannon
description: Based off ofThe Leviathan Heavy Assault Cannon (HAC) STC has recreated a variant of this gun for its CEO making it compatiable for the Crusader frame.

profiles.name: Standard
profiles.effect: Unlike other Superheavy weapons, the Ragnarok can be used with Skirmish. You can spin up this weaponâ€™s barrels as a quick action.

actions.name: Spin Up Ragnarok
actions.detail: Spin up the barrels of the Ragnarok Heavy Assault Cannon, Slowing your mech and allowing use of its Spin-Up Mode profile.

profiles.name: Spin-Up Mode
profiles.effect: While spinning, you are Slowed and can no longer use the Ragnarok with Skirmish. You can cease this effect as a protocol.

actions.name: Cease Spin-Up
actions.detail: Spin up the barrels of the Ragnarok Heavy Assault Cannon, Slowing your mech and allowing use of its Spin-Up Mode profile.

profiles.name: Charge Rail: 1
profiles.effect: Set yourself to 3 HEAT (not counting heat you gained prior). Requires Lock on for valid target.

profiles.name: Charge Rail: 2
profiles.effect: Set yourself to 7 HEAT (not counting heat you gained prior). Requires Lock on for valid target. Ignore cover, shoot though terrain.

profiles.name: Charge Rail: 3
profiles.effect: Set yourself to 15 HEAT (not counting heat you gained prior). Requires Lock on for valid target. All targets adjacent to the Line must make an Agility save or take half damage if passed then no damage. Additionally ignore cover, shoot though terrain.

profiles.name: Safety override
profiles.effect: Set yourself to 15 HEAT, take 1 Stress dammage and mark the gun as destroyed once you fire. Gain reliable 20 against anyone in the line. All targets adjacent to the line must roll a agility safe or take damage if they pass they only take half the damage (reliable does not count). Additionally ignore cover, shoot though terrain. Requires lock on. (Once the weapon is destroyed due to the safey override you can only repair this with 3 repair capacity.)
